message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9200. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is still a great deal considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10000. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit above $10000, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer it to you for $10800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10500. I'm willing to pay $10400 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still a bit above $10500, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer it to you for $10600. This is the final offer I'm willing to make, and I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10500. I'm willing to pay $10300 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already compromised as much as I'm willing to. I'm not willing to go any lower than $10600. If you're still interested in the product, I'm willing to sell it to you at that price. If not, I'll have to consider other offers.
I understand that you've compromised as much as you're willing to, but I'm still not willing to pay $10600. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. This is my final offer.
